alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Nuckolls (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 3:10PM CST until December 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM PEAKING THROUGH TONIGHT BUT CONTINUES INTO TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, lingering heavy snow. For the Winter Weather Advisory, pockets of lingering mainly light snow. Additional snow accumulations mainly between 1 and 3 inches, most of which which fall through tonight. Northwest winds gusting 25 to 35 MPH into this evening, but decreasing to only 10 to 20 MPH late tonight through Tuesday. * WHERE...Clay, Fillmore, and Nuckolls Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until midnight CST tonight. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions for post-Christmas travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The majority of accumulating snow will fall prior to midnight tonight, allowing the Winter Storm Warning to be replaced by a Winter Weather Advisory thereafter.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
